headline: Was Jim Cramer Right About Ecolab (ECL)?
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Nailed These 12 Stock Predictions. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Ecolab Inc. (NYSE:ECL) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. During a recent episode of Mad Money, which aired on Wednesday, the 7th of May, Jim Cramer gave some advice […]

headline: Ecolab (NYSE:ECL) Declares US$0.65 Dividend & Amends Bylaws To Limit Officer Liability
summary: Ecolab (NYSE:ECL) recently affirmed a quarterly dividend of $0.65 per share and amended its certificate of incorporation to limit officer liability, moves indicative of solid governance and commitment to shareholder value. Over the last month, Ecolab's share price rose by 12%, reflecting a robust performance. This rise contrasts with broader market movements steered by trade discussions and Federal Reserve decisions, which saw only modest gains, implying that Ecolab's strategic actions,...
